留言內容: I like the fit is nice n not tight .Like the fabric.I ordered the navy blue ,disappointed that it’s muted grayed navy instead of the deep navy shown on site .The sleeves are shorter than I prefer . I am going to keep it ,it washes well n doesn’t fade ,hang to dry . Had sleeves been longer I would have ordered another a white one too

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: A - 黑色
留言內容: I love the femininity of these. Modest, cute and cool. Can be dressed up or dressed down. I personally wear a cami spaghetti strap tank under it, but that’s just my personal preference now that I’m older and it is sleek material (not see-through, but sits on the skin differently than cotton for sure)… I equate it to wearing spanks or spandex shorts under a skir…I’m not looking to hooch it up, lol…can I get an Amen! Woop woop!!

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: B- Fp White 001
留言內容: I bought the white with little flowers. Fits great. Style great. It is paper thin. I focused on reading reviews on breathability as prior Amazon tops felt like I was wrapped in saran wrap. I neglected the thin part as sellers seemed to all sell thin shirts in prior years but moved away from that. Not happy as what’s the point of breathable fabric if one has to wear a camisole or tank under it? Lesson learned. I will only be able to wear this on stay-at-home days.

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: A - 皇家藍
留言內容: I wanted to love this shirt, but as soon as I opened it from the package, it smelt horribly of body odor. I quickly tried it on just to get a size reference so I could possibly re-order, come to find out I need to size down 1. The shirt itself is nice, good quality, lovely color. But the shirt I received was stanky, speckled with food/grease spots, and no tag! How the company proceeded to reseal the shirt in a new package with its smell is beyond me..

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫

留言內容: Basic nice top for summer. The color is accurate and can be dressy or casual. I bought it to wear under a blazer. I like the pleated collar and sleeves. I will have to alter the sleeve, under arm area, so my bra is not visible. You could wear a camisole but I would prefer to alter. I’m petite so this is often an issue unless it is XS or petite. Have not washed it yet, reviews are mixed and does appear a bit flimsy.

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: A - 酒紅色
留言內容: Cute top and awesome color variety - but a couple of caveats: First, whoever says these shirts are wrinkle-free right out of the dryer is telling a tall tale, unless they typically go out in wrinkled clothes (see pictures).  Second, the material is on the cheap side - which itself isn't a problem to me but I'd be very concerned about scorching it if I ironed it (which I'd clearly need to do, based on point #1).  3) There is some slight sheerness, which you can also see near the bottom of one of the pictures, but nothing super revealing.  A cami underneath and that will take care of it.  But especially if you get free returns with Prime, there's no harm in ordering this top to try it out and decide for yourself if you're on the fence about it.For size reference,  I'm 5'8 138 and the small was OK (still felt a little loose in the neckline area for my preference, but it would work).

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫

I am a 42DDD and I find it hard to find tops (especially a dressier/business style) that are long enough to still cover my mind section and flatter my curves - without showing too much.Small sleeves covered the top of my arms (an areas that I am a bit more self conscious about).  Lightweight material is nice and breathable.  It washed and hung nicely. No shrinkage :-)Will definitely be buying it in different colors/patterns!

商品名稱: TASAMO 女款 休閒 圓領 基本款 打褶 上衣 袖子 弧形鑰匙孔 背面 雪紡襯衫

留言內容: I usually wear a medium, but Amazon suggested the Large. I like these style blouses loose, so I did, and it is perfect. I am 5'9", 160 lbs., and a B cup.  Because I am smaller breasted, if I do have bloating, my belly does show touching the material and it make it more poochy than it actually is. Have to wear the tummy tucker undergarments. When feeling fine it needs nothing. I got the pink and it does need a white, nude, or pink bra underneath. It just fits comfortably in the underarms; I think if I got the medium it would have been too tight there. There is no stretch.

They are a little longer than most blouses, and they don't look sloppy if they are not tucked in. The only issue I had was that I couldn't get the wrinkles out without steaming the blouses, but once I steamed them one time, they have been fine.
